subproject.description: Pilot Business Development Services for PLHIV in 7 districts of Petauke, Mongu, Lstone, Mansa, Kabwe, Kasama and Mumbwa.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Promoting Sustainable Liveliho

subproject.description:
Localization of Millennuim Development Goals in Petauke District, Eastern Province:

1.1.1 At least 40,000 vulnerable HHs, especially female (50 %), elderly, persons with disabilities, youth-headed HHs and those affected by HIV&AIDS in Petauke District are identified, acquire skills in sustainable livelihoods and viable SMEs.

1.1.2 An additional of at least 2,000 target vulnerable HHs, especially female (50 %), elderly, persons with disabilities, youth-headed HHs and those affected by HIV&AIDS in Petauke District  develop viable SMEs, sustainable agriculture initiatives and access productive resources.

1.2.1 National Programme Steering Committee and Coordination Secretariat established and operational.

1.2.2 District and sub-district project implementation, coordination, monitoring and reporting structures established and operational.

1.2.3 Community development service providers' capacity to support and improve livelihoods, and food security at HH and community levels enhanced.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Localization of MDGs Petauke
